entries.text: An iron charm that resembles a mass of weapons. Boosts maximum equipment weight. This talisman was derived from an unusual greatsword, wielded by a king hungry for vengeance.

A medallion with viridian amber inlaid. Boosts maximum stamina. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.

A medallion with Crimson amber inlaid. Boosts maximum HP. The Erdtree's old sap becomes amber, treasured as the most precious of jewels in the age of Godfrey, the first Elden Lord. A primordial life energy resides inside.
